name: Bubble Running Away HD Free - The Line Runner Mania Game Saga for iPad & iPhone
name_original: Bubble Running Away HD Free - The Line Runner Mania Game Saga for iPad & iPhone
description:
### Game look simple, but this really challenge your skills! ###

### This game is insane! ###

This is awesome bubbe game, where your goal is collect all the coins on dropping bubbles. You need to dodge skulls, because you lose one life if touch them. Which make this game really challenging, is that you will lose also one life if coin touch bottom of the screen. You have one advantage when you play, you can move player over side of screen to other side, this is sometimes necessary if you want survive.

This is really fun and addictive game, when you try to make new records.

[ features ]

+ support iOS7
+ Awesome gameplay
+ Easy to learn
+ Hectic gameplay

[ more games ]

We have also made other great games, so type "Codecube Brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ feedback ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support :)
